name: T-Surf Prototype
description:
A prototype game project made as a school graduation project.

It is heavily inspired by the Treasure Planet game on PS2 by Bizarre Creations.

It includes 2 levels, each with multiple challenges and activities you can do in any order you wish. These include:

  • Time-Trial - Race through the checkpoint gates as quickly as you can to beat the best time.
  • Ring Race - Race through a series of rings before time runs out. Each ring will add to the timer.
  • Trick Challenge - Jump off of ramps and preform tricks in the air to earn points within the time limit. Try to beat the high-score. (This one is only in the mountain level. The one you start in.)
  • Collectables - In each level are a number of green orb...things. Get 'em all.

Since this was the first out of the two projects I did for my graduation, it is pretty rough around the edges. Most of the game was made in only a month and I spent an additional month during the following semester adding new features, a new level and making it look a bit more presentable (the first level was just gray-box for that first month). So there are some bugs and jank due to that shaky foundation. If I could go back and start over knowing what I know now I would do things pretty differently (Heck, maybe I will do that if I have time).

The main bug to look out for is problems with the collision of the board. If it gets stuck in some way, try performing a trick with the Q,E or F keys, that should get you un-stuck.
